reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 224/23: PROVINCIAL PRIORITIES IN EDUCATION - STUDENT ACHIEVEMENT
reg_info.reg_name_text: PROVINCIAL PRIORITIES IN EDUCATION — STUDENT ACHIEVEMENT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 224/23: PROVINCIAL PRIORITIES IN EDUCATION - STUDENT ACHIEVEMENT

content.content: 1. For the purposes of subsection 11.2 (1) of the Act, the following are the provincial priorities in education in the area of student achievement: 1.  Achievement of learning outcomes in core academic skills. 2.  Preparation of students for future success. 3.  Student engagement and well-being.
content.raw_html:
1. For the purposes of subsection 11.2 (1) of the Act, the following are the provincial priorities in education in the area of student achievement:

1.  Achievement of learning outcomes in core academic skills.

2.  Preparation of students for future success.

3.  Student engagement and well-being.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
